title: Happy Birthday, Eli!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Eli, happy birthday~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Kyah!? Ai, don’t just pounce on me like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Calm down, calm down. Today’s a special day. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Okay. Are you going to keep me here for now because they’re still preparing for the party?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Nope, that’s not the case. We’ve already finished preparing for the party, but I came to celebrate with you before the party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Before the party......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s right~! I’m here to pick you up because there are some places we need to go before we go to the party venue! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>We have some surprises for you before the party even starts! Nozomi and Nico asked me to help!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>They’re doing something!? Wait, I’m not ready for what’s in store~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
